nodes.text: Agrippa Aldrete was a male human who at one point served as the senator of the planet Alderaan in the Senate of the Galactic Republic. By the time of the Naboo Crisis in 32 BBY, he served as an aide to Senator Bail Antilles, alongside fellow Alderaanians Liana Merian and Stonroy Soma. Aldrete retained that post after Bail Antilles was replaced by Bail Organa, serving alongside Sheltay Retrac.

Agrippa Aldrete was among the many characters that were ultimately cut from the 1999 movie Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the first installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. According to the fan website Star Wars Autograph Collecting, Aldrete was portrayed by Henry Jones.
